backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, activities, messages, and access‑controlled APIs for social fitness app operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to the new format by adding age and fitness goals with default values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the frontend and loading the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, authentication checks, onboarding redirect logic, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/ActivityLogger.t: Component for simulating step counts and manually logging squats and pushups via mutations.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation to home or sign‑in and login/logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Top navigation bar rendering route buttons with active state based on current path.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper that shows header, conditional nav, main content, and footer based on user profile state.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Displays messages with sender alignment, timestamps, and styling for own versus others’ messages.
frontend/src/components/QueryStates.tsx: Reusable UI components for loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/UserLookupForm.t: Form for searching a user by principal ID and triggering an action when found.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for profiles, activities, friendships, and messaging using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark mode themes.
frontend/src/lib/date.ts: Provides a helper that returns today’s date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
frontend/src/lib/sports.ts: Defines available sports and a function mapping sport enums to display labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatThreadPage.tsx: Renders a chat thread with message loading, sending, scrolling, and identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user profile and daily fitness goal progress using activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Manages following, followers, and user discovery with follow/unfollow actions.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Handles friends list, requests, and adding friends with accept/decline flows.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Allows opening chat threads by user ID and lists quick-access contacts.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Renders the onboarding form for new users, validating input and creating a profile before redirecting to the dashboard. Handles auth guards and redirects based on profile state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the user’s profile information, allowing updates to name, age, goals, and sport. Includes copy-to-clipboard for the user ID.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Handles login via Internet Identity and routes users to onboarding or the dashboard based on stored signup intent and profile presence.
frontend/src/pages/SportSelectionPage.ts: Allows users to select or update their preferred sport and saves changes to their profile. Redirects unauthenticated users to sign-in.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and enabled plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for the Sportified app, including architecture notes, limitations, and a list of implemented features such as user accounts, sport selection, fitness tracking, social systems, and messaging.
